title: I still utterly hate junglers with a passion
body: Because it is so much fun knowing they are near you and having to afk and let your lane opponent get free cs, health (if they have lifesteal of some kind), pressure, and etc without being able to do anything about it. How is this fun, how is this enjoyable, why are junglers allowed to decide lanes more then the actual laners like what kind of shit is that?
